title: 'Misleading Product: Looks Different from the Image'
body: I recently purchased the backpack from Amazon, and unfortunately, I'm disappointed with my purchase. The product I received looks significantly different from the image shown during the buying process.  Moreover, the design elements and overall construction of the backpack are not accurately represented in the product image. The materials used feel cheaper and less durable than I had anticipated. The stitching is not as neat and secure as shown, and the overall quality is underwhelming.  Overall, the disparity between the product received and the image shown on the Amazon listing is disappointing. The backpack's appearance, quality, and size differ significantly from what was presented, which has left me unsatisfied with my purchase.

title: 'The straps are not stitched properly'
body: 'I use this bag for keeping my laptop chargers a couple of diaries and a pen thats all. After a few months of using the product the strap started tearing off as if the bag is carrying something beyond its capacity. Expecting a replacement cash refund or atleast a free repair for the same as warranty period is still not over.'
